title: Bona Vita
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Italian, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Predominantly non-veg restaurant for tourists with a section of menu for vegetarian dishes using various soy-based mockmeats in salads and sandwiches. Cheese is used in most dishes. Large space with nice interior decorated in tall bamboo and palm tree art. Open 11.00-23.00. Directions: If facing the St. Wenceslas Statue, the restaurant is in a shopping center on the left hand side, about 400 meters before you reach the statue.
streetAddress: Pasaz Jalta, Vaclavske Namesti 43, Praha 1, Czechia
